sk.tomsik68.mclauncher.api.versions

Interface IVersionInstaller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MCAssetsVersionInstaller

    public interface IVersionInstaller
    Installer can install versions of some type

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addVersionInstallListener(IVersionInstallListener listener)
      Adds listener to be notified when version installation finishes.
      void install(IVersion changed, MinecraftInstance mc, IProgressMonitor progress)
      Installs specified version to MC instance

    • Method Detail

      • install

        void install(IVersion changed,
             MinecraftInstance mc,
             IProgressMonitor progress)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Installs specified version to MC instance
        Parameters:
        changed - Version to be installed
        mc - Target MinecraftInstance
        progress - ProgressMonitor which will watch the whole progress
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - I/O errors, download errors, incompatibility etc.

      • addVersionInstallListener

        void addVersionInstallListener(IVersionInstallListener listener)
        Adds listener to be notified when version installation finishes. Listeners will be cleared after ONE installation.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to be notified
